rdf:Description.fake:marcfield: F245 03 $a An invitation to poetry : $b a new Favorite Poem Project anthology / $c edited by Robert Pinsky and Maggie Dietz with the editorial assistance of Rosemarie Ellis.

F520 ## $a An anthology of classical and contemporary poems are introduced by everyday people from across the United States, including pieces by such masters as Shakespeare, Keats, and Dickinson and featuring an accompanying video introduction by one of the editors.
rdf:Description.rdaed:P20069: An anthology of classical and contemporary poems are introduced by everyday people from across the United States, including pieces by such masters as Shakespeare, Keats, and Dickinson and featuring an accompanying video introduction by one of the editors.
